hotels.title: Canada: Rustic Quebec Riverside Retreat with Five Restaurants, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Escape to Canada's most enchanting log castle, where rustic luxury meets modern comforts. This iconic chateau sits majestically on the Ottawa River, offering an unforgettable retreat just 90 minutes from Montreal. With five distinctive restaurants serving everything from fine dining to casual bistro fare, your culinary journey begins the moment you arrive. Dive into pure relaxation at the heated swimming pool, then surrender to bliss at the spacious spa facility. The serene riverside setting provides the perfect backdrop for romance, adventure or relaxation. Whether exploring the pristine grounds or enjoying championship golf, every moment at Montebello feels like a fairy tale come to life.
